TITLE: Wicked Problems
DEF: Society-scale problems that are hard to address because of incomplete, contradictory, and changing requirements
TASK: The Wicked Problems pattern engages learners in tackling complex, ill-defined issues with no clear solution. By promoting critical thinking, interdisciplinary collaboration, and innovative problem-solving, it prepares learners for real-world challenges. The main challenge lies in formulating these problems in a way that fosters productive discussions and creativity. Effective use of this pattern involves presenting problems that reflect real-world complexities, fostering a supportive environment, and potentially utilizing AI to guide problem-solving strategies.
